elements.label: The Exile's Voice
elements.description: Rich like wine and cold as winter and as dead as bone. Laughter so cruel it could slip between the ribs like a knife-blade and twist in the guts. No sound fills me with more dread.

elements.label: The Exile's Touch
elements.description: Beatings, burnings; the pulling of nails and the peeling of skin. And there were things worse still the Exile would inflict on my body, and inflict with ecstasy.

elements.label: The Exile's Design
elements.description: Night after night they would wax poetic of what they intended for me. All the pains inflicted and secrets whispered would hone me into something awful. I fear that - becoming the Exileâ€™s perfect, awful instrument. But should I?
